title: Hard Myth to Swallow (with Kofi Thomas)
itunes:title: Hard Myth to Swallow (with Kofi Thomas)
description:
Did Lil' Kim go to the hospital to get her stomach pumped after a night with the Wu-Tang Clan? Langston and his guest Kofi Thomas (Pause with Sam Jay) go down and pop open this classic hip hop urban legend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
